A '''shepherd''' is a [[villager]] that [[trade]]s shears, wool, dyes, paintings and beds. Shepherds wear a brown hat and a white coat.

== Spawning ==
An unemployed [[villager]] turns into an shepherd when an unclaimed [[loom]] is nearby.

=== Natural generation ===
{{Main|Villager#Spawning}}
The workstation of shepherds, the [[loom]], generates in shepherd houses in [[village]]s.

== Drops ==
{{Main|Hero of the Village#Gifts}}
{{IN|java}}, a shepherd can drop a random color of [[wool]] by throwing it as a gift towards a nearby player with the [[Hero of the Village]] effect.
